definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׁפח]] (√ of foll.; cf. Sab. [[ספח]] pour, also n. [[מספחת]] efusion (?) DHM:VOJ ii (1888). 189 Hom:Chr 124; Ar. safah.a pour out water, shed blood ; note (with ref. to etym. of foll. words) phr. sa0fah.aha0 commit fornication with her (Lane), i.e. effudit cum ea (sc. semen) Fl in De:Jes 3, 78 Anm.; on Ph. [[שפח]] servant (?) cf. Hoffm:Ph. Inscr.18 Lzb: 381).
